results.content: In 2011, Power Glory Technology settled down in Xiaoting District, Yichang. At the beginning, the company used an Original Equipment Manufacturer model. With a limited volume of orders, they developed slowly. Since 2005, they have been customizing high-performance batteries and adaptable power supplies for clients. The new ultra-high-capacity ...
results.raw_content:
Power Glory charges up for further growth
By Shen Yuan, Yichang International Communication Studio
Yichang has many leading companies in their respective industries, with Power Glory Technology Co., Ltd. being one of them. Power Glory is China’s largest producer of lithium manganese button batteries. Their newly built 25,000 square meter plant is equipped with the world's most advanced automated production line. Once put into use, the new plant will increase production efficiency by about three times, building a strong foundation for Power Glory to continue their growth in 2024.
Photo by Yang Qing
In 2011, Power Glory Technology settled down in Xiaoting District, Yichang. At the beginning, the company used an Original Equipment Manufacturer model. With a limited volume of orders, they developed slowly.
Since 2005, they have been customizing high-performance batteries and adaptable power supplies for clients. The new ultra-high-capacity and ultra-high-power batteries put the company on a steep growth trajectory. They have received orders from world-class clients such as Energizer, Toshiba and BOE.
Photo by Tan Xuejiao
In 2016, the company’s output value surpassed 1 billion yuan (US$13.99 million) and they became the largest primary lithium battery manufacturer in China.
Power Glory’s products are widely used in China's ETC (Electronic Toll Collection) Card. ETC is a system that automatically and wirelessly collects toll road fees. Their button batteries occupy a large percentage of the domestic ETC card market.
In 2022, Power Glory’s revenue reached 360 million yuan, an increase of 18 percent year on year. In the first half of 2023, their revenue reached 185 million yuan, an increase of about 13 percent over the same period last year.

The application of high-capacity button batteries in car keychains is mainly to provide power for various electronic devices and sensors to ensure their normal operation.
The following are some application characteristics of high-capacity button batteries in car key fobs:
Efficient energy storage: High-capacity button batteries have a large energy storage capacity and can provide long-term power supply for electronic devices and sensors in car key fobs. This gives the car key fob a longer service life and reduces the trouble of frequent battery replacement.
Stable performance: The voltage and current output of high-capacity button batteries are relatively stable and can provide reliable power supply for electronic devices and sensors in car key fobs. This helps ensure the car key fob works properly, improving its reliability and stability.
Compact and lightweight: High-capacity button batteries are small and lightweight, making them easy to integrate into car keychains. This design makes the car keychain more compact and lightweight, making it easy to carry and store.
Safe and reliable: High-capacity button batteries usually have good safety properties such as explosion-proof and leak-proof, which can reduce safety risks. In addition, some high-capacity button batteries are also waterproof and dustproof and can be used in a variety of environments.
In short, high-capacity button batteries play an important role in car key fobs, providing efficient, stable, reliable, and safe power supply, thus ensuring the normal use of car key fobs and user convenience.

The application of Coin cell battery in blood glucose meters mainly involves providing power to the blood glucose meter to support its normal work and operation.
The following are some application features of Coin cell battery in blood glucose meters:
Small and lightweight: Coin cell battery is small and light, making it easy to integrate into a blood glucose meter. This design makes the overall blood glucose meter lighter and easier to carry and store.
Long battery life: Some high-end Coin cell batteries have a long service life and can support the use of the blood glucose meter for a period of time without the need for frequent battery replacement. This provides greater convenience to users.
Good stability: The voltage and current output of the Coin cell battery are relatively stable and can provide reliable power supply for the blood glucose meter. This helps ensure the accuracy and reliability of blood glucose test results.
High safety: High-quality Coin cell battery has over-discharge, over-charge and other protection functions, which can reduce battery damage and safety risks. In addition, some Coin cell batteries are also waterproof and dustproof and can be used in a variety of environments.
In short, the Coin cell battery plays an important role in the blood glucose meter, providing it with a stable, reliable, and safe power supply, thereby ensuring the accuracy of blood glucose test results and the health and safety of users.
